channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Let Parents Protect Their Kids from Gender Ideology in Public Schools
item.description: The Supreme Court should affirm the right of parents in Montgomery County, Md., to opt out of radical teaching on gender.

item.title: Trump’s War on the Fed
item.description: Politician-driven monetary policy has a long record of failure.

item.title: RFK Jr.’s Quest To Discover Autism Causes Will Help Restore Americans’ Trust In Science
item.description: Not only does science need to be correct to be effective, but it also needs to be perceived to be correct.

item.title: Expensive WI Supreme Court Seat Already Paying Off For Wealthy Leftist Donors
item.description: The cemented left-led court has upheld Democrat Gov. Tony Evers’ veto trick to increase public school funding for the next four centuries.

item.title: The Courts Are The Scofflaws Behind Our Current Constitutional Crisis
item.description: The Supreme Court’s double standard suggests it is not prudence dictating the outcome. It is also not the Constitution.

item.title: Florida protester screams at Rep. Byron Donalds during tense town hall
item.description: A protester was seen on video yelling at Rep. Byron Donalds and being escorted away by security during a town hall hosted by the Florida Republican.

item.title: Minneapolis DA will not pursue criminal charges against suspected Tesla vandal
item.description: The Minneapolis district attorney will not pursue criminal charges against a Minnesota state employee accused of vandalizing at least six Teslas.

item.title: We Need a New and Improved Environmentalism
item.description: This Earth Day, let’s commit to an environmentalism that works for America, not against it.

item.title: It’s Time to Hold International Organizations Accountable for Supporting Terrorism
item.description: Sovereign countries can be sued for providing such aid. Institutions such as UNRWA should be no different.

item.title: Art Shouldn’t Get A Free Nudity Pass Just Because It’s Art
item.description: The fact that celebrated works from the past contain nudity doesn’t justify us including it in our films, literature, and other mediums.
